alert.note: Alert for Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: High Surf Warning issued June 21 at 7:04AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A HIGH SURF WARNING IS IN EFFECT THROUGH THURSDAY... * SURF...Surf heights of 15 to 17 feet will impact South and east facing shores of all islands * TIMING...Through Thursday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Expect ocen water sweeping across beaches and breaching coastal walls. Major impacts to coastal properties and infrastructure are expected with extreme breaking waves, powerful longshore and potentially deadly rip currents. Severe coastal erosion is likely. Extremely large waves will bring ocean debris onto roadways, impact all harbors, and make navigating the harbor channel exceptionally dangerous. Lapataiga mo galu matua maualuluga Ofisa o le tau Pago Pago AS 701 TAEAO ASO LULU IUNI 21 2023 ...Lapataiga mo Galu maualuluga... * GALU...Galu maualuluga e 15 i le 17 futu e aafia ai talafatai i saute ma sasa`e o le atunuu * TAIMI...e oo atu i le Aso Tofi. * NOFOAGA AAFIA...E fafati maualuga galu, malolosi le aave o le sami, ma e tafiesea nofoaga. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O lapataiga mo galu maualuluga e faailoa mai ai le malolosi ma le tetele o galu o le a aafia ai gatafale ma matafaga, ma o le a malolosi aava o le sami e ono solo ai nisi o vaega o le matafaga. Faiva po o le ona o le siisii o tulaga o sami ma galu, e le tatau i le au fai mamalu lautele ona fagogota pe maimoa i galu. O i latou i le matafaga, e mafai ona maua faafuaseia e galu.
info.instruction: A high surf warning indicates dangerous large breaking waves will pound the shoreline in the warning area, producing deadly rip currents and localized beach erosion. Also, it is extremely dangerous to fish or observe waves from rocks during high surf conditions. Unwary beach walkers can be caught off guard as waves suddenly race farther up the beach than normal.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
